products.name: Collection 8 Denim Jacket
products.description: The Denim Jacket is made in the USA from vintaged Japanese denim in a relaxed fit shaped by back pleats. The minimalist trucker style features a shirt collar, antique brass front zipper, side pockets, and antique brass buttons for adjustability. A leather Fear of God label is at the back collar.

The minimalist trucker style features a shirt collar, antique brass front zipper, side pockets, and antique brass buttons for adjustability. A leather Fear of God label is at the back collar.

products.name: Milano Vee Neck
products.description: The Milano V-Neck Tee is made in Italy from a stretch jersey that combines comfort with formal polish. The V-neck tee is visibly modern, with relaxed proportions and a stylish drape. A Fear of God leather label is stitched at the back collar.

products.name: Milano Vee Neck
products.description: The Milano V-Neck Tee is made in Italy from a stretch jersey that combines comfort with formal polish. The V-neck tee is visibly modern, with relaxed proportions and a stylish drape. A Fear of God leather label is stitched at the back collar.

products.name: Embroidered 8 Milano Sweater
products.description: The boucle straight neck sweater is knitted in Italy from a heavily textured virgin wool blend and detailed with a jacquard 8, symbolic of the collection number. The design features a straight neckline with volume in the body and sleeves to create a round silhouette. A Fear of God leather label is stitched at the back collar.

products.name: Embroidered 8 Milano Tee
products.description: The Embroidered 8 Milano Tee is made in Italy from a stretch jersey that combines comfort with formal polish. A heavily textured embroidered  "8" on the front signifies Fear of God's collection number. The fit is relaxed with a stylish drape. A Fear of God leather label is stitched at the back collar.
